segments.text: Hey man , what do you have on tap ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Heineken and Budweiser . We have a two-for-one happy hour special .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool , give me a pint of Heineken and half a pint of Bud .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay ... A pint of Heineken and and half a pint of bud for table six ! And what about some appetizers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure ! Let ’ s have some nachos and mozzarella sticks .
segments.speaker: S1
